text: Mansur Yavaş ( 23 May 1955, Ankara) is a Turkish lawyer and politician who is currently the Mayor of Ankara, holding the office since April 2019. He was elected in the 2019. == Biography == Yavaş was born in the Beypazarı district of Ankara. Yavaş studied at Istanbul University in 1979 and graduated from the law faculty in 1983. == References == Category:1955 births Category:Politicians from Ankara Category:Turkish lawyers Category:Istanbul University alumni Category:Living people
title: Mansur Yavaş
